attributes.action: public must have the right to challenge the CAA descissions .cold war jets ect
attributes.additional_details: The CAA are allowed to sit in judgement on  issues regarding the return to flight of jet aircraft while we citizens and taxpayers have no right to question them or appeal against their jumbled logic. We wish to be able to question the caa on there decion
attributes.background: Ex army 12 years with 1 rha. Massive supporter of coldwar and vintage aircraft.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
